meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>demon</kanji> that <kanji>suck</kanji>s <kanji>blood</kanji>? What mythological creature can you think of that sucks blood? How about a <vocabulary>vampire</vocabulary>? Them Sparklzzzz!
readingMnemonic: 吸血 should be easy for you to read. The 鬼 part uses the reading you already learned with the kanji, き. Easy, no?
